snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry urged “a positive vote” as the Syrian opposition weighed whether to join a peace conference scheduled for next week.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry offers public assurance that Obama administration remains committed to goal of establishing transitional government in Syria that does not include Pres Bashar al-Assad, as Syrian opposition nears decision on whether to attend international peace conference to end conflict.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry urged “a positive vote” as the Syrian opposition weighed whether to join a peace conference scheduled for next week.

headline.main: Kerry Offers Assurances as Syria Talks Draw Near
headline.print_headline: Kerry Offers Assurances as Syria Talks Draw Near
